label: logicB:transport_en
steps: [1] If the closure on Highway 7 is lifted, then Highway 7 is reopened to traffic.
[2] If Highway 7 is reopened to traffic, then traffic may enter Highway 7.
[3] For any truck x, if x passes the weigh station inspection, then x is cleared to use Highway 7.
[4] If traffic may enter Highway 7 and Truck A is cleared to use Highway 7, then Truck A may enter Highway 7.
[5] The closure on Highway 7 is lifted.
[6] Truck A passes the weigh station inspection.
[7] Traffic may enter Highway 7 and Truck A is cleared to use Highway 7. (from [1â€“3],[5],[6])
[8] Truck A may enter Highway 7. (from [4] and [7])
